REASON: I have noticed no side effects -other than the obligatory weight gain I would love to blame on Enjuvia rather than self-gratification!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR ENJUVIA: When I missed a pill, I did not have the immediate headache by morning that I used to have on Premarin. Enjuvia seems to do a better job of replacing my hormones as I noticed increased energy and enthusiasm for life within a week or two of starting it.
